title: Creating a quarkus project using the maven archetype stopped working in Maven 3.8.5

labels.name: triage/duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
### Describe the bug

I get errors when I try creating a new Quarkus project using the Maven archetype:

```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.7.5.Final:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=my-groupId \
    -DprojectArtifactId=my-artifactId
```

### Expected behavior

The above command should create an empty Quarkus project.

### Actual behavior

When using Maven 3.8.5, this is the output that I get:

```
‚ùØ mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.7.5.Final:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=my-groupId \
    -DprojectArtifactId=my-artifactId
[INFO] Scanning for projects...

[INFO] Building Maven Stub Project (No POM) 1
[INFO] --------------------------------[ pom ]---------------------------------
```
